snippet: Formula One races are supposed to have nothing to do with local politics, but the fight to stage them usually becomes a political affair. Nowhere is this quite so clear as in France.
abstract: Formula One races are supposed to have nothing to do with local politics, but the fight to stage them usually becomes a political affair. Nowhere is this quite so clear as in France.

headline.main: As French Election Heats Up, So Does Campaigning for French Grand Prix
